subject: Self Care
title: EQ Under Pressure
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on EQ Under Pressure.

hook.text: Captain Sullenberger landed a plane on the Hudson River with 155 passengers. His pulse barely rose. EQ under fire.

buildup.text: Pressure doesn't build character â€” it reveals it. EQ determines whether you crumble or function during a crisis.

discovery.text: High-EQ individuals under stress focus on what they can control and release what they can't. That's the key.

twist.text: EQ under pressure is built during calm times. You can't train for a crisis during a crisis. Practice daily.

climax.text: Box breathing, mental rehearsal, and emotional labeling â€” practice these daily so they're automatic under pressure.

punchline.text: Train calm when life is easy. Deploy it when life isn't.

quiz.question: When should you practice EQ skills for high-pressure situations?
options: During calm daily moments so they become automatic
